entities.name: ginnys diary
entities.description: Ginny's personal diary where she confides in Tom Riddle.

entities.name: tom riddle
entities.description: The person who is writing in Ginny's diary and pretending to be a friend.

entities.name: ginny weasley
entities.description: An eleven-year-old girl who confides in Tom Riddle through her diary.

relationships.description: Tom Riddle has charmed Ginny Weasley into pouring out her soul to him.
Tom Riddle possesses Ginny's diary and is writing in it.
